description: "A late 19th century map depicting a route from Hanoi to That-Khe via Lang-Son (in northern Vietnam, near the border with China at Kouang-Si (Guangxi)). Two inset maps feature plans of military forts, villages, rivers and fields along the route."
title: "Itinéraire   de   Hanoi   à   That-khe   par   Lang-son   (frontière   chinoise   du   Kouang   Si)   /   dressée   par   M.A.   Aumoitte,   chancelier   du   Consulat   de   France   à   Hanoi,   juillet-août   1881"
